content: my fave dishcloth skill level easy size approx 8 square materials 1 ball worsted wt cotton e g lily sugar n cream size g/6 4 25 mm crochet hook or size needed to achieve gauge tapestry needle for weaving in ends gauge 13 double_crochet = 4 on size g/6 4 25 mm hook terms/abbreviations back loop only blo beginning beg chain chain double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet hook hk repeat repeat single_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch stitch st dishcloth row 1 chain 23 double_crochet in third chain from hook double_crochet in ea chain across 22 double_crochet row 2 chain 1 turn single_crochet in ea double_crochet across 22 single_crochet row 3 chain 2 turn double_crochet in ea single_crochet across 22 double_crochet repeat row 2 and 3 five times border round 1 chain 1 turn single_crochet evenly around entire dishcloth working 3 single_crochet in ea corner join with slip_stitch 1 round 2 chain 2 turn half_double_crochet in ea single_crochet around working 3 half_double_crochet in ea corner join with slip_stitch round 3 do not turn but chain 1 and work slip st loosely in back loop only blo of ea half_double_crochet around join with slip_stitch if hanging loop is desired chain 6 at last corner before final join with slip_stitch copyright 2017 2008 kathy north www ravelry com/designers/kathy-north for personal or charity use only do not duplicate pattern for commercial purposes 2
